in the name of truth
Bronya Zajcek
Bronya Zajcek

A girl from Siberia who controls the power of Herrscher with a mortal body, her past experience will become the cornerstone for her step by step towards the future. The core of reason gives her the ability to "analyze" and "reconstruct", in a single thought Turn inspiration into reality, create an array of space-based weapons that can destroy all armies, and eliminate all enemies that stand in your way.
Anti-entropy Mech·Mass Production
The mass-produced mecha of anti-entropy is used to replace the Valkyrie as the main force against Houkai. It can be divided into basic models, advanced models, and cutting-edge models. models.
Anti-Entropy Armor Ultimate
Anti-entropy's limited-edition mecha is powerful and unique.
Poor combat effectiveness, eye-catching mobility, the meaning of existence lies in the fireworks that bloom at the end.
Spider Mech
It is still weak in combat power, with eye-catching mobility, and it is additionally equipped with a range of mobility reduction after the explosion.
Spider Mecha
It is still weak in combat effectiveness, with eye-catching mobility, and it is additionally equipped with a permanent reduction in range of mobility after the explosion.
Ice Mecha
In short, it is still weak in combat power, and its mobility is impressive. This time, there are brighter fireworks, and the explosion range is doubled.
ember
Basic mecha, what else can we expect from it?
Titan Mecha
Power can lift the sky! Let them feel the horror of being dominated by Papa Titan! (Warning! The jump system is not installed!)
Dynamo Armor
Rock solid! Let them feel the horror of being dominated by Papa Titan! (Warning! Hegemony system is not installed!)
rock armor
The power of a Tomahawk missile! (not at all)
tomahawk
You don't even want to call me Godfather!
godfather
No dancing, no mantras, no skulls around your necks.
Shaman Mech
There is no need for sacrifices or blue bars, and there is no need to meditate at night to prepare spell slots.
Sorcerer Mech
Um? Does your name have anything to do with shamanism?
double snake
Beware the Herrscher of the Sky!
Thunder Mecha
No way, no way, no one can really be controlled by the magnetic storm mecha, right? It was me who was charged. That's fine.
Magnetic Storm Armor
Ashes! However, there is no respawn function, and don't try to press and hold the dodge button to use the machine gun to fire.
Mech on Fire
Strictly speaking, this is the Mecha of Destiny, but now who is the Bishop of Destiny, I can only say that I know everything.
Death Mech
What happened to the Destiny Mech! What I say is anti-entropy is anti-entropy! Only the destiny is allowed to copy the anti-entropy, and the anti-entropy is not allowed to steal the destiny?
Iberki
It's an anti-entropy armor.
Yashenji Mistedtin

"Don't bow to the collapse, don't surrender to the gods."
Anti-entropy armor
The mass-produced mecha of anti-entropy is used to replace Valkyrie as the main force against Houkai.

For the Herrscher of Reason, there is actually no difference between "one" and "three hundred thousand" [NewLine] Walter Joyce, Joachim Young, Bronya Zajcek...they Any one of them is actually not only one of the 300,000 people, but also all of the 300,000 people. The reason why the name of "The Herrscher of Reason" can be passed down to this day is that its "power" and "will" have long been integrated[NewLine] No single person has ever been able to take on the heavy responsibility of protecting the world[NewLine] But everyone can Have the desire to protect the world[NewLine] After all...the only unchanging "truth" of human beings is "the truth of human beings will inevitably change"
"The power of one person may not be strong enough. The thoughts of 300,000 people may not be rich enough. But Bronya at this moment is the real Herrscher of Reason!"
Bronya Zajcek
